---
title: "Conditional Content"
filters: [details]
---

Show different content based on whether the output format is interactive (HTML) or non-interactive (PDF, Word).

## Inside Details Blocks

```markdown
::: {.details summary="Interactive Demo"}

::: {.interactive-only}
<button onclick="alert('Hello!')">Click Me</button>
:::

::: {.non-interactive-only}
*Button not available in this format. See the online version.*
:::

:::
```

::: {.details summary="Interactive Demo"}

::: {.interactive-only}
<button onclick="alert('Hello!')" style="padding: 8px 16px; cursor: pointer;">Click Me</button>

This button only appears in HTML output.
:::

::: {.non-interactive-only}
*Interactive button not available in this format. Visit the online documentation to try the demo.*
:::

:::

## Standalone Usage

Conditional divs also work outside of details blocks:

```markdown
::: {.interactive-only}
Use the interactive controls below.
:::

::: {.non-interactive-only}
See the web version for interactive features.
:::
```

::: {.interactive-only}
**You are viewing the interactive HTML version.** All interactive features are available.
:::

::: {.non-interactive-only}
**You are viewing a static format.** Some interactive features may not be available.
:::

## Use Cases

- Embed interactive widgets in HTML, show screenshots in PDF
- Include JavaScript demos for web, placeholder text for print
- Provide format-specific instructions
